text: The Ekamai bus terminal (sometimes transcribed as Ekkamai-) is a bus terminal (or bus station) on Sukhumwit Road in Bangkok. The station is in Khlong Toei District (of Bangkok). ==History== In July 2017, a decision had been made to move the terminal, according to media; where the terminal will be moved to, media has not reported (as of July 2017). ==Other names== *Bangkok Bus Terminal (Eastern)" is written on signs (both with Thai and English) - on the roof of the terminal and in front of the entrance. *Ekkamai Eastern Bus Terminal Category:Buildings and structures in Bangkok Category:Transport in Thailand Category:Bus transport in Asia
title: Ekamai bus terminal
